entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
